languages.text: "Жаль, преподобный Иеронимус не слушает меня. Слишком он истов, слишком отчетливо зрит лицо порока и слишком много мерзости в нем находит. Тошно ему смотреть на Футфол, вот он и... приветствует очищение".

"Shame that Reverend Hieronymus won't listen to me. He's too zealous. He sees the face of vice too clearly and finds it too abhorrent. Looking at Footfall makes him sick, and so he... welcomes the cleansing."
languages.original_text: "Жаль, преподобный Иеронимус не слушает меня. Слишком он истов, слишком отчетливо зрит лицо порока и слишком много мерзости в нем находит. Тошно ему смотреть на Футфол, вот он и... приветствует очищение".

traits.locale_text: "Shame that Father Hieronymus won't listen to me. He's too zealous. He sees the face of vice too clearly and finds it too abhorrent. Looking at Footfall makes him sick, and so he... welcomes its cleansing."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: “很可惜，希罗尼穆斯牧师并不打算听我的意见。他太狂热了，他对落脚港的罪恶太清楚了。他觉得这一切都令人厌弃，光是看到落脚港，就让他感到恶心不已，因此……他对这场大清洗持欢迎态度。”
languages.original_text: "Shame that Reverend Hieronymus won't listen to me. He's too zealous. He sees the face of vice too clearly and finds it too abhorrent. Looking at Footfall makes him sick, and so he... welcomes the cleansing."

traits.locale_text: “很可惜，希罗尼穆斯牧师并不打算听我的意见。他太狂热了，他对落脚港的罪恶太清楚了。他觉得这一切都太可恶了，光是看到落脚港，就让他感到恶心，所以……他对这场大清洗持欢迎态度。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムス司祭が私の話を聞かないのは、残念です。彼は熱狂的すぎるのです。悪の顔がハッキリ見えるから、あまりに忌まわしいと思っているんです。フットフォールを見ていると、気分が悪くなるそうで。だからこそ…浄化に肯定的です」
languages.original_text: "Shame that Reverend Hieronymus won't listen to me. He's too zealous. He sees the face of vice too clearly and finds it too abhorrent. Looking at Footfall makes him sick, and so he... welcomes the cleansing."

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムス司祭が私の話を聞かないのは、残念です。彼は熱狂的すぎるのです。悪の顔がハッキリ見えるから、あまりに忌まわしいと思っているんです。フットフォールを見ていると、気分が悪くなるそうで。だからこそ…浄化に肯定的です」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «Lástima que el reverendo Hieronymus no me escuche. Es demasiado fervoroso. Ve vicio en todas partes y lo encuentra aberrante. Odia Paso, por lo que... recibe la purga con los brazos abiertos».
languages.original_text: "Shame that Reverend Hieronymus won't listen to me. He's too zealous. He sees the face of vice too clearly and finds it too abhorrent. Looking at Footfall makes him sick, and so he... welcomes the cleansing."

traits.locale_text: «Lástima que el padre Hieronymus no me escuche. Es demasiado fervoroso. Ve vicio en todas partes y lo encuentra aberrante. Odia Paso, por lo que... ansía su desaparición».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Ein Jammer, dass Reverend Hieronymus nicht auf mich hört. Er ist zu fanatisch. Er sieht das Gesicht des Lasters zu deutlich und findet es zu grauenhaft. Footfall anzusehen, widert ihn an, daher ... begrüßt er die Läuterung."
languages.original_text: "Shame that Reverend Hieronymus won't listen to me. He's too zealous. He sees the face of vice too clearly and finds it too abhorrent. Looking at Footfall makes him sick, and so he... welcomes the cleansing."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Jammer, dass Vater Hieronymus nicht auf mich hört. Er ist zu fanatisch. Er sieht das Gesicht des Lasters zu deutlich und findet es zu grauenhaft. Footfall anzusehen, widert ihn an, daher ... begrüßt er die Läuterung der Station."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Malheureusement, le révérend Hiéronymus refuse de m'écouter et, je dois le dire, fait preuve de ce que l'on pourrait appeler un excès de zèle. Aucun vice ne lui échappe et tous lui sont abjects. La simple vue de Castel le rend malade, donc... cette purification est pour lui une bénédiction. »
languages.original_text: "Shame that Reverend Hieronymus won't listen to me. He's too zealous. He sees the face of vice too clearly and finds it too abhorrent. Looking at Footfall makes him sick, and so he... welcomes the cleansing."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, le père Hiéronymus refuse de m'écouter et, je dois le dire, fait preuve de ce que l'on pourrait appeler un excès de zèle. Aucun vice ne lui échappe et tous lui sont abjects. La simple vue de Castel le rend malade, donc... cette purification est pour lui une bénédiction. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Muhterem Hieronymus'un beni dinlemiyor olması çok yazık. Kendisi fazlasıyla bağnaz. Ahlaksızlığın suretini net bir şekilde görüyor ve nefret uyandırıcı buluyor. Binliman'a bakmak onu hasta ediyor, bu yüzden de... Arındırmayı hoş karşılıyor."
languages.original_text: "Shame that Reverend Hieronymus won't listen to me. He's too zealous. He sees the face of vice too clearly and finds it too abhorrent. Looking at Footfall makes him sick, and so he... welcomes the cleansing."

traits.locale_text: "Muhterem Hieronymus'un beni dinlemiyor olması çok yazık. O fazlasıyla bağnaz. Ahlaksızlığın suretini fazlasıyla net bir şekilde görüyor ve onu fazlasıyla nefret uyandırıcı buluyor. Binliman'a bakmak onu hasta ediyor, bu yüzden de... Arındırmayı hoş karşılıyor."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
